snippet: A judge ruled that two 13-year-olds accused of stabbing a classmate last year to please an online horror character will stay in adult court.
abstract: Wisconsin Judge Michael Bohren rules that two 13-year-old girls will be tried as adults on charges that they stabbed classmate in order to please fictional character Slender Man.
lead_paragraph: A judge ruled that two 13-year-olds accused of stabbing a classmate last year to please an online horror character will stay in adult court.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Girls in ‘Slender Man’ Case Ordered to Remain in Adult Court
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Girls In ‘slender Man’ Case Ordered To Remain In Adult Court
